title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 127 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 127 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Except the LORD build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the LORD keep the city, the watchman waketh but in vain.
lineList.cn: （所罗门上行之诗）若不是耶和华建造房屋，建造的人就枉然劳力。若不是耶和华看守城池，看守的人就枉然警醒。

lineList.en: It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.
lineList.cn: 你们清晨早起，夜晚安歇，吃劳碌得来的饭，本是枉然。惟有耶和华所亲爱的，必叫他安然睡觉。

lineList.en: Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward.
lineList.cn: 儿女是耶和华所赐的产业。所怀的胎是他所给的赏赐。

lineList.en: As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth.
lineList.cn: 少年时所生的儿女，好像勇士手中的箭。

lineList.en: Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
lineList.cn: 箭袋充满的人便为有福。他们在城门口和仇敌说话的时候，必不至于羞愧。
